metadata.Title: CVE-2022-40304 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in libxml2 before 2.10.3. Certain invalid XML entity definitions can corrupt a hash table key, potentially leading to subsequent logic errors. In one case, a double-free can be provoked.

advisory.DiscoveredBy: Ned Williamson and Nathan Wachholz from Google Project Zero

criterions.comment: libxml2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
